description:
Our lawyers have been recognized by our peers with an AV Preeminent rating by Martindale-Hubbell*, the highest rating for legal ability and ethics. Located in Butler, Pennsylvania, and representing clients throughout the state, the attorneys of the law offices of Luxenberg Garbett Kelly George, P.C., are dedicated to assisting clients in wide range of legal matters, including personal injury law. Driven by a sense of service to our communities and the clients we call our friends and neighbors.

Our firm has been standing strong for more than 80 years. With a track record of success and a reputation as a firm with skilled attorneys who care, we look to achieve the standard of service we've set for ourselves in every case we take. Dedicated to ensuring you receive personalized care and attention, we offer free initial consultations to sit with you and hear your story.

Whether you or a family member has been the victim of a car accident caused by another driver's negligence, or need practical legal advice when dealing with insurers, our team of legal professionals will ensure the you and your family receive counsel that fits your unique needs. Contact the law offices of Luxenberg Garbett Kelly George, P.C. We don’t represent case numbers; we defend our friends and neighbors.

* AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
